```{r}
page_url <- "http://edgar.jrc.ec.europa.eu/overview.php?v=CO2ts_pc1990-2013"
XPATH <- '//*[@id="layout"]/div[3]/div[2]/div/div/div/div/table'

table_list <-
  page_url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(xpath = XPATH) %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)

CarbonRaw <-
  table_list[[1]]

head(CarbonRaw)
```
